messages.subject: Re: Thrilled My child
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/18/2002 5:23:24 PM Eastern Standard Time, ... We are going to the conference! I was under the impression that they couldn t do combat
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/18/2002 5:23:24 PM Eastern Standard Time,
AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes:


> Yeh!! Like us. We're SCA newbies, just been with them for a few months
> really.....went to an event last year but didn't really get it together
> until
> a couple months ago.
> Anyway, are you still going to the conference? The boys could bring their
> youth combat gear if other SCA'ers will be there.
> I think Sandra's kids are coming, at least some of them.
> My kids had that look of awe at our first event. They could hardly believe
> how cool it was. They still love it and look forward to fighter practice
> every Sunday. Tell Julian he'll be among some like minded folks (in more
> than
> one way)!!
>

We are going to the conference! I was under the impression that they couldn't
do combat stuff until they were older... But Julian would LOVE to see this
stuff.

Getting excited,
Kathryn


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
